Package com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh

This API exposes all functionality related to sharing live video stream during a CS call via the Video Sharing service.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NewVideoSharingListener
    New video sharing invitation event listener
    VideoCodec
    Video codec
    VideoPlayer
    Video player offers an interface to manage the video player instance independently of the joyn service.
    VideoPlayer.Error
    Video player error
    VideoPlayerListener
    This class offers callback methods on video player events
    VideoRenderer
    Video renderer offers an interface to manage the video renderer instance independently of the joyn service.
    VideoRenderer.Error
    Video renderer error
    VideoRendererListener
    This class offers callback methods on video renderer events
    VideoSharing
    Video sharing
    VideoSharing.Direction
    Direction of the sharing
    VideoSharing.Encoding
    Video encoding
    VideoSharing.Error
    Video sharing error
    VideoSharing.State
    Video sharing state
    VideoSharingIntent
    Intent for video sharing invitations
    VideoSharingListener
    Video sharing event listener
    VideoSharingLog
    Content provider for video sharing history
    VideoSharingService
    This class offers the main entry point to share live video during a CS call.
    VideoSharingServiceConfiguration
    Video sharing service configuration

Package com.gsma.services.rcs.vsh Description

This API exposes all functionality related to sharing live video stream during a CS call via the Video Sharing service.
